title: Enhance Ability
content:
: Gain Advantage on Wisdom Checks.

Bear's Endurance: Gain Advantage on Constitution Checks, and 7 temporary hit points. Cat's Grace: Gain Advantage on Dexterity Checks, and half damage from falling. Bull's Strength: Gain Advantage on Strength Checks, and double Weight Limit. Eagle's Splendour: Gain Advantage on Charisma Checks. Fox's Cunning: Gain Advantage on Intelligence Checks. Owl's Wisdom: Gain Advantage on Wisdom Checks.

How to Acquire Enhance Ability

Enhance Ability can be acquired by
